text: Don Pimpón is a fictional character in Barrio Sésamo, the Spanish version of Sesame Street. He travels around the world, bringing presents for everybody when he returns. He claimed to be a friend of the Maharaja of Kapurthala, probably an allusion to the marriage of this Indian prince to Spaniard Anita Delgado. According to a song in the show Don Pimpón is a finch ("Pinzón" in Spanish).Barrio Sésamo: Espinete y Don Pimpón - Tipi Tipi Ton 1:25 However, Alfonso Vallejo, the Spanish actor who plays the role of Don Pimpón, has said that the character is based on himself.Vertele ==References== Category:International Sesame Street characters Category:Fictional birds Category:Television characters introduced in 1972
